page.title: 02GENERAL REVIEW OF AREA(CONT)
page.content: {Parliamentary Constituencies.}The majority of the area is in the Hyde & Stalybridge Constituency.The M.P.is Tom Pendry (Labour).A small section is in Ashton-under-Lyne and the M.P. is Robert Sheldon(Labour).The M.B.C.is labour controlled and has its administrative centre in Ashton-under-Lyne.The bus services are run by Greater Manchester Transport.The area is served by a weekly newspaper the "Mossley and Stalybridge Reporter" and also two free newspapers "The Advertiser" and "The Leader". The free papers are financed by advertising revenue and delivered to every house.
